pages.text: $(li)The Evokers are powerfull summoners who are able to attack you summoning fangs on the ground that makes damage to you. It is able to summon $(l:patchouli:illagers/vex)Vexes$(/l) to attack you too.$(br)$(li)On death they may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l), a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/totem_of_undying)Totem of Undying$(/l), the $(l:patchouli:enders_journey/ender_eyes)Magical Eye$(/l) and very rarely the $(l:patchouli:weapons/conch_of_conjuring)Conch of Conjuring$(/l).

This creature can be found in the $(l:patchouli:illagers/mansion)Mansions$(/l), $(l:patchouli:illagers/illager_fort)Illager Forts$(/l), $(l:patchouli:illagers/illager_tower)Illager Towers$(/l) and in a $(l:patchouli:illagers/raid)Raid$(/l).
